quest.name: Abide by the Rules
Abide by the Rules
quest.text: Before resuming your adventure and exploration, you need to register on the boarding list of the ship by signing its rules.
Speak to Julia, the shipkeeper of this ship. She is waiting for you on the first deck.

quest.name: Abide by the Rules
Abide by the Rules
quest.text: Julia told you about all the rules you have to follow during your adventure so that you behave properly with other people.
Keep them in mind, but if you think you still need to hear them again, just talk to Julia.

quest.name: Warm Smelly Clothes
Warm Smelly Clothes
quest.text: Magic Arpan is waiting for you. Go speak to him.
To speak to an NPC, click on it with your mouse or select it using the N key and then chat using the T key.

quest.name: Warm Smelly Clothes
Warm Smelly Clothes
quest.text: You need to open the chest and take the clothes from it.
To perform this action, click on the chest with your mouse or select it with the N key and then interact with it using the T key.

quest.name: Warm Smelly Clothes
Warm Smelly Clothes
quest.text: To open your inventory, use the F3 key or use your mouse to select it in the above menu in your client.
When your inventory is open, you can equip an item by selecting it and clicking 'Equip'. You can do the same to remove an item by clicking on 'Unequip'.
Items have different effects. Some will heal you, some can be used as weapons or armor and some can be sold for gold.

quest.name: Warm Smelly Clothes
Warm Smelly Clothes
quest.text: You wore the clothes you found in the chest that Magic Arpan showed you.
They are old and a bit smelly but the warm sensation they give makes you feel at home.
Reward: A [Creased Shirt] and old [Creased Shorts].

quest.name: Piberries Lover
Piberries Lover
quest.text: A mysterious stowaway needs your help. He hides at the bottom level of the ship, in the storage room.
It seems to be an urgent task, but he is afraid that you could be a sailor, so watch out!

quest.name: Piberries Lover
Piberries Lover
quest.text: Alige, the mysterious traveller, is asking for your help to find him some food.
In fact, he hides in a hole in the main hallway. It leads to the ship's storage room where he can reach for some barrels full of [Piberries].
He is sick of eating these berries all the time. That is why he would like you to find him other kinds of food and bring them to him.

quest.name: Piberries Lover
Piberries Lover
quest.text: You brought Alige some food, different from the [Piberries] he usually eats.
It looks like he is eager of tasting new flavors. Try bringing him other types of food. He may have something to give you in exchange.

quest.name: Ratto Extermination
Ratto Extermination
quest.text: Peter needs your help to clean the bottom of the ship from some rattos.
Speak to him when you will have time to help him.

quest.name: Ratto Extermination
Ratto Extermination
quest.text: Peter asked you to empty the bottom of the ship for free.
Maybe next time he will have something to offer you...

quest.name: Ratto Extermination
Ratto Extermination
quest.text: Cleaning the bottom of the ship is a tough work, but Peter is offering you some gold for it.

quest.name: Ratto Extermination
Ratto Extermination
quest.text: You helped Peter cleaning the bottom of the ship for free.
However, it looks like these rattos can come back again. Later, you could ask Peter if he needs your help again.

quest.name: Ratto Extermination
Ratto Extermination
quest.text: You helped Peter cleaning the bottom of the ship. He rewarded you with some gold.
However, it looks like these rattos can come back again. Later, you could ask Peter if he needs your help again.

quest.name: Ratto Extermination
Ratto Extermination
quest.text: This time, Peter seems to have a reward for you. After you cleaned the bottom of the ship, ask him for a reward.

quest.name: One of Us
One of Us
quest.text: Nard, the captain of the ship, asked you to help his crew on the island outside the ship.
Gugli, one of his sailors, is waiting for you on the shore to tell you about the task.

quest.name: One of Us
One of Us
quest.text: You reported to Nard that you successfully accomplished Gugli's task.
As a perfect sailor, you are waiting for the next order, eagerly.

quest.name: One of Us
One of Us
quest.text: Captain Nard has another task for you. It seems he did a mistake in the past, choosing the right lieutenant for this ship.
Chef Gado, the former shipkeeper, may have something to say about that. So does Julia, the current lieutenant of the ship.

quest.name: One of Us
One of Us
quest.text: You smartly solved the lieutenants' conflict onboard. Nard is proud of his new sailor.
Take your reward from the box near the captain in order to officially become one of Nard's crew members.

quest.name: One of Us
One of Us
quest.text: Nard officially proclaimed you as member of his crew!

quest.name: Chef's Secret Blade
Chef's Secret Blade
quest.text: You found a sharp knife on a table in one of the rooms of the ship.
It looks like its previous owner used it to prepare delicious dishes for the crew.

quest.name: Fish and Scams
Fish and Scams
quest.text: A sailor, who wasn't on Gugli's list, gave you a box full of food.
He did not mention any reward, but he would like you to deliver it to Gugli as soon as you can.

quest.name: Fish and Scams
Fish and Scams
quest.text: Couwan is an awful, roguish person. No reward from him...
However, Gugli gave you some gold pieces and apologized for this unexpected task.
He also warned you not to trust anyone.

quest.name: Treasure's Glint
Treasure's Glint
quest.text: You spotted a treasure chest at the top of a cliff on the east side of the island.
The chest contains gold and an [Old Book].

quest.name: Unexpected Help
Unexpected Help
quest.text: Gugli told you about the sailors' task on the island. He wants you to help some of them bringing him 6 boxes full of [Croconut], [Aquada] and [Plushroom].
You need to collect the boxes from Tibbo, Gulukan, Q'Muller, Astapolos, Jalad and Ale.
Max, Silvio and Lean may have some information about where to find these sailors.

quest.name: Unexpected Help
Unexpected Help
quest.text: You completed all the tasks Gugli gave you. Sailors of the ship will never forget you!

quest.name: Two Lieutenants in One Boat
Two Lieutenants in One Boat
quest.text: Chef Gado wants you to collect 2 [Piou Legs], 2 [Half Croconut], 1 [Aquada] and 1 [Sea Drops] to prepare a [Poisoned Dish], for Julia.

quest.name: Two Lieutenants in One Boat
Two Lieutenants in One Boat
quest.text: Chef Gado prepared the [Poisoned Dish]. He would like you to give it to Julia.
While Chef Gado wants you to poison Julia, you remember she looked after you when you were sick. She doesn't deserve to be punished... or does she?

quest.name: Two Lieutenants in One Boat
Two Lieutenants in One Boat
quest.text: Go back and talk to Gado. He probably has a reward for you.

quest.name: Two Lieutenants in One Boat
Two Lieutenants in One Boat
quest.text: You successfully poisoned Julia. Chef Gado finally had his revenge!

quest.name: Two Lieutenants in One Boat
Two Lieutenants in One Boat
quest.text: You refused to accomplish Chef Gado's evil plan. Julia is now safe.

quest.name: Two Lieutenants in One Boat
Two Lieutenants in One Boat
quest.text: You preferred trusting Julia because, after all, she deserves to be the lieutenant of the ship.

quest.name: The Lazy Brother
The Lazy Brother
quest.text: Katja wants you to find her brother.
He is hiding somewhere on the hill, not far from here.
You should probably go and check behind trees, they are great for hiding.

quest.name: The Lazy Brother
The Lazy Brother
quest.text: Apparently he's hanging out here all day, because he doesn't want to do his homework.
You decided to let him do so in exchange for a small reward.

quest.name: The Lazy Brother
The Lazy Brother
quest.text: Apparently he's hanging out here all day, because he doesn't want to do his homework.
You can not allow this. Therefore you told him to go home.
You should tell Katya about it.

quest.name: The Lazy Brother
The Lazy Brother
quest.text: You found Bobo. He promised to go home soon.
His sister was very happy and gave you an [Aquada] as a reward.

quest.name: Moon and the Urchin
Moon and the Urchin
quest.text: Moon, the elven girl, accidently stepped on an urchin.
She wants you to bring her some [Croc Claw] to get rid of spikes.

quest.name: Moon and the Urchin
Moon and the Urchin
quest.text: You helped Moon to get rid of urchin spikes from her foot.

quest.name: Catch the Piou
Catch the Piou
quest.text: Salem, the trader from Artis Market, needs your help.
A piou escaped from him, and he wants you to catch it.
The piou is flying around the town, not far from the Market.
When you catch it, hurry back to Salem.

quest.name: Catch the Piou
Catch the Piou
quest.text: You successfully returned the piou to the trader.

quest.name: Fishman
Fishman
quest.text: Eugene, the fishman in Artis docks, bought a new fishing rod.
He hurried so much to try it out, that he forgot to take enough bait.
You need to bring him 10 [Small Tentacles]

quest.name: Fishman
Fishman
quest.text: As his gratitude, he gave you his old fishing rod.
You can use it to catch fish.

quest.name: The Buried Treasure
The Buried Treasure
quest.text: Q'Onan, the orc sailor from Nard's crew, used to be a thief.
His last "business" involved robbing a nobleman. But he didn't succeed completely, because he had to bury the chest full of coins to save himself.
Only the approximate location of it is known (Artis Hill, (180, 27)), so you'll have to do a little digging to get money.

quest.name: The Buried Treasure
The Buried Treasure
quest.text: After a lot of digging, you found the treasure chest.
It's locked, and Q'Onan has the only key. So you'll have to deliver it to him.

quest.name: The Buried Treasure
The Buried Treasure
quest.text: Q'Onan kept his promise, and gave you your share of the deal.
He said that he finally can pay back his debts.

quest.name: Visiting Artis
Visiting Artis
quest.text: Bacchus asked you to bring him a [Pumpkin].
Cuco drops them, in the locked room of La Johanne's Hold.

quest.name: Visiting Artis
Visiting Artis
quest.text: Bacchus offers you to see a small part of your future.
Reward: chance to see the future.

quest.name: Alige in the Barrel
Alige in the Barrel
quest.text: Alige was very scared of the Cuco. Now that it's killed, he should be okay.
Coordinates: La Johanne, Hold, Alige's Hideout (38,22)

quest.name: Alige in the Barrel
Alige in the Barrel
quest.text: Somehow Alige appeared in my vision of the future.
For killing the scary Cuco, he gave me a [Barrel].

quest.name: Plushroom Addict
Plushroom Addict
quest.text: Rumly is expecting you to return.
He is still offering his services.

quest.name: Plushroom Addict
Plushroom Addict
quest.text: Rumly is waiting for you to bring him some [Plushroom].

quest.name: Plushroom Addict
Plushroom Addict
quest.text: Rumly is able to reset your character point.
Bring him some [Plushroom] and he will be able to do it for you.

quest.name: Newby Quest
Newby Quest
quest.text: You are charged to visit Chelios and to bring back Enora's package.
Chelios is reachable at the Blacksmith building (95,109).

quest.name: Newby Quest
Newby Quest
quest.text: Chelios asked you to bring him some black iron
You should look for Lloyd at the Merchant Building (100,37).

quest.name: Newby Quest
Newby Quest
quest.text: Lloyd gave you the black iron package.

quest.name: Newby Quest
Newby Quest
quest.text: Chelios made a sword out of black iron ore.
This task is done, you can now return it to Enora.

quest.name: Newby Quest
Newby Quest
quest.text: You are charged to visit Resa and to bring back Enora's package.
Resa is reachable at the Light Armor building (55,72).

quest.name: Newby Quest
Newby Quest
quest.text: Resa gave you a cute [%Color% Artis Tank Top, Camel Cotton Dye].
This task is done, you can now return it to Enora.

quest.name: Newby Quest
Newby Quest
quest.text: You are charged to visit Q'Pid and bring back Enora's package.
Q'Pid is reachable at the Market Place, in the South-West area of Artis (61,116).

quest.name: Newby Quest
Newby Quest
quest.text: You lost the riddle of Q'Pid, you have to go to Ivan to get Enora's potions.
Ivan is in a small house near Artis's canal (163,71).

quest.name: Newby Quest
Newby Quest
quest.text: This task is done, you can now return them to Enora.

quest.name: Newby Quest
Newby Quest
quest.text: Some citizen worry about their safety with the growing number of Fluffy on the Hill of Artis.
Enora's latest task for you is to clean up this hill.
Killing about 10 Fluffy should be enough to calm down the neighborhood.
The hill is located on North-East of Artis (172,46).

quest.name: Newby Quest
Newby Quest
quest.text: You completed every task and you even cleaned up the hill of these terrible Fluffies.
Reward: [Training Gladius], [%Color% Artis Tank Top, Camel Cotton Dye], 5 x [Pibberries Infusion]

quest.name: Fexil's Free Pass
Fexil's Free Pass
quest.text: Lloyd gave you a pass that Fexil forgot when he registered himself in the Merchant Guild.

quest.name: Fexil's Free Pass
Fexil's Free Pass
quest.text: Fexil wants to open a business of [Fluffy Fur]'s clothes.
He will reward you for each fur you bring him.

quest.name: Fexil's Free Pass
Fexil's Free Pass
quest.text: Fexil wants to open a business of [Fluffy Fur]'s clothes.
He rewards you for each fur you bring him.

quest.name: Worship Of Money
Worship Of Money
quest.text: You are now registered in the Merchant Guild.
This Guild offers storage and bank services.
